Name: Evospace
About the game: Completly changabe world The resource-rich world does not contain any dangers, but the path to your goal will still not be easy. Automatization A large number of machines and technologies. Logistics of items, fluids, electricity, heat, kinetic energy. Deep automation of all processes. Logic circuits and block controllers and more await you at Evospace.
